io.netty.handler.codec.redis
Encoder, decoder for Redis.

    BulkStringRedisContent

    Subclasses with type arguments of type RedisMessage in io.netty.handler.codec.redis
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    final class 
    RedisArrayAggregator
    Aggregates RedisMessage parts into ArrayRedisMessage.
    final class 
    RedisBulkStringAggregator
    A ChannelHandler that aggregates an BulkStringHeaderRedisMessage and its following BulkStringRedisContents into a single FullBulkStringRedisMessage with no following BulkStringRedisContents.
    class 
    RedisEncoder
    Encodes RedisMessage into bytes following RESP (REdis Serialization Protocol).
